articles.author: By MELINDA DESLATTE Associated Press
articles.title: Vote delay for updated Louisiana college admission standards
articles.description: BATON ROUGE, La. (AP) — Louisiana's top higher education board on Thursday postponed decision-making on a strengthening of its minimum admission standards for public colleges that would include new financial penalties for campuses that violate the policy.
articles.content:
BATON ROUGE, La. (AP) Louisiana's top higher education board on Thursday postponed decision-making on a strengthening of its minimum admission standards for public colleges that would include new financial penalties for campuses that violate the policy.

articles.author: By HOLLY RAMER Associated Press
articles.title: Report: Oversight of child restraints, seclusion lacking
articles.description: CONCORD, N.H. (AP) — Children were restrained or secluded in New Hampshire’s residential treatment facilities more than 20,000 times in five years, according to a state watchdog office’s report released Thursday.
articles.content:
CONCORD, N.H. (AP) Children were restrained or secluded in New Hampshires residential treatment facilities more than 20,000 times in five years, according to a state watchdog offices report released Thursday.
